text: ema gasa yata oba veta (ata di) porondu dun visvasavantayin gæna niyata vasayenma allah sæhimata pat vuveya. ovunge hrdayanhi (satyaya vu parityagasili adahasa gæna) hondin dæna, (santiya ha) manasata sæhælluvada ovun kerehi pahala kaleya. ikman jayagrahanayada (kayibar namæti sthanayedi) ovunta (parityagayak vasayen) laba dunneya
